component.name: companyLookUp
component.description: The Company Profile API:? Retrieves and displays one or more company profiles based on the company ID or universal name.:? Returns basic company profile data, such as name, website, and industry.:? Returns handles to additional company content, such as RSS stream and Twitter feed.

component.name: searchCompanyPage
component.description: The Company Search API enables search across company pages.

component.name: followCompanyPage
component.description: Members can follow companies to receive updates for company activities such as new job postings, employment changes, and new products.
